newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Distilleries rises despite duty hike.
newsitem.headline: Distilleries rises despite duty hike.

text.p: Distilleries Company of Sri Lanka Ltd rose 7.7 percent, or 50 cents, to seven rupees, on turnover of 571,000 shares, as investors shrugged off a 10 percent duty hike on hard liquor in the budget for fiscal 1997, brokers said.
"The company, which has the major share of the local market for alcohol, is going to hardly feel the impact," said a local broker.
